t: From A to Z: The History of the Amazon Logo | Looka
s: November 28, 2024 - Equally iconic is the Amazon logo. As the company has evolved, the Amazon logo has given us a unique visual record of its journey. Culminating in the design we all know and love today: the legendary Amazon Smile. As far as famous brands go, Amazon is up there with the best of them.

s: Amazon changed the icon to resemble an Amazon shipping box. In mid-2020, this app icon was quickly changed after many people thought the blue tape resembled Adolf Hitler's moustache (with the arrow itself making his smile). [1] At the end of that same year, Amazon replaced the style of the tape.

s: May 26, 2019 - Some brands use wordmarks, which feature only the brand name in a unique font, such as Google or Coca-Cola. Others opt for lettermarks, which are abbreviated initials, like IBM or NASA. Iconic logos use symbols or graphics to represent the brand, as seen in the Apple logo or Nike’s swoosh.
